div.bibl: Mens Italica, (Monthly), Dec. 1937. CHRONICLES--JUSTINIAN SOCIETY OF ADVOCATES

body.p: Attorney Joseph Zaffina, one of the most intelligent and active members of the Justinian Society of Italian Advocates, was elected president of that organization for the year 1938.
The Justinian Society of Italian Advocates is composed of Italian lawyers of Chicago and is an auxiliary of the Bar Association of Illinois.
